brannvrn.tagline: VR fire safety training for hospital staff
brannvrn.description: Designed a VR simulation that teaches hospital employees how to respond to fire emergencies — without the risk. Built through user research with firefighters and healthcare workers.

hobbyist.description: Designed and built a social app that helps people find others who share their hobbies — whether that's hiking, board games, or cooking. No swiping, just genuine connections.

gonefishing.description: Designed and developed a PWA that lets fishermen log catches, track locations, and record conditions — available offline for use on the water.

work.title: My Work
work.description: A collection of projects showcasing my journey in UX design and frontend development. Each project represents real problem-solving through user research, design thinking, and technical implementation.

brannvrn.teaser: UX Process & Learning Design in action: A VR fire safety simulator where I designed the complete user experience and pedagogical framework—transforming complex safety procedures into intuitive, educational interactions.

gonefishing.teaser: User Research in Practice: A fishing tracker app built through conversations with real anglers—addressing pain points in existing apps through iterative design and community feedback.

hobbyist.teaser: UX-Centered Design: A social platform shaped by conversations with friends and potential users—focusing on simplicity, intuitive navigation, and genuine human connection.

holidaze.teaser: Holidaze is a cozy booking app for slow-living getaways—browse, book, and unwind in handpicked cabins and retreats.

auction.teaser: Own The Bid is a fast-paced auction app where users can list, bid, and browse items with ease, no account needed to explore.

timerPlanner.teaser: A productivity application combining a customizable focus timer with flexible weekly and monthly planning tools, featuring drag-and-drop scheduling.

piaSalary.teaser: A privacy-focused income tracking application with automatic tax calculations, Excel import/export, and bilingual support—all data stored locally.

clicketycart.teaser: ClicketyCart is a retro-style eCom store with fast checkout, instant delivery, and smooth shopping powered by the Noroff API.

communityScience.teaser: My second project as a student—not a reflection of my skills today, but another milestone in my development journey.

gamehub.teaser: My very first web development project—not a reflection of my skills today, but a reminder of where my journey began.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: UI/UX Designer & Frontend Developer
about.bio: I'm a passionate developer and designer based in Norway, combining technical skills with creative vision to build beautiful, functional web experiences.
about.heroDescription: Bridging technology and art with 2+ years in frontend development and 3+ years in digital design. Creating accessible, interactive web experiences.
about.storyP1: I'm a <highlight>UX designer and frontend developer</highlight> with a background in game development, animation, and visual communication. Passionate about creating <accent1>engaging, educational experiences</accent1> through user-centered design and creative storytelling.
about.storyP2: My profile uniquely <highlight>bridges design and development</highlight>—combining artistic expertise from The Game School with technical skills from frontend development. This allows me to work seamlessly across the full product lifecycle, <accent2>from concept to code</accent2>.
about.storyP3: From developing <accent1>VR training simulations</accent1> for the healthcare sector to building modern web applications, my work reflects a commitment to creating <accent2>visually appealing products</accent2> that reflect the users' needs—making content accessible and inspiring through thoughtful UX and visual design.
about.ctaDescription: I'm actively looking for frontend development or digital design opportunities where I can grow, collaborate, and contribute to meaningful projects.

timeline.customerServiceDesc: Handling insurance cases via phone support. Using Salesforce CRM for case management.
timeline.frontendDevDesc: 2-year vocational degree. Specialized in React, JavaScript, modern web development, and UI/UX design.
timeline.visualDesignerDesc: UI/UX design and visual identity. Strategic decisions about color, imagery, and layout.
timeline.bachelorAnimDesc: Technical development with concept art, 3D design, animation, and motion graphics.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
contact.responseDesc: I typically respond within 24-48 hours. Looking forward to hearing from you!
contact.successMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. I'll get back to you soon!
contact.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again or email me directly.
